titleStmt.title: To the honourable knights, citizens, and burgesses, of the Commons House of Parliament the humble petition as well, of diuers merchants and citizens of London that vse buying and selling of fustians made in England, as of the makers of the same fustians.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A72815 of text S125111 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 16777.8). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

titleStmt.title: To the honourable knights, citizens, and burgesses, of the Commons House of Parliament the humble petition as well, of diuers merchants and citizens of London that vse buying and selling of fustians made in England, as of the makers of the same fustians.

notesStmt.note: Requesting that fustians not be subject to export taxes as the raw materials employed in their manufacture are taxed on importation--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
